name: Dice-stination
description:
Relaxing, but challenging,  puzzle game created for the GMTK game jam.  Match the side of the dice with the tiles to move around the level.  Keep a close eye on the number of moves you have left, and  laser range. Reach the green tile to finish the level. Controls:
  • LMB (on next tile): move
  • RMB pan: rotate view
  • Shift + LMB (on side of dice): shoot
  • ESC: menu
Team:

Unique - Programming

ADEELCode2 - Sound & Music 

KTurnzz - Design & Programming

Didikong3 - Programming

VikS - 2D and 3D Art
